intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you add {description2} to my cart?
intent: The person in the video mentions that they use headphones to play a certain game. Can you add the most expensive item with the theme of that game to my cart?
intermediate_intent: What was game the person in the video mentions they play using the headphones?

instantiation_dict.description: mentions that they use headphones to play a certain game
instantiation_dict.description2: the most expensive item with the theme of that game

must_include: Nintendo Joy-Con (L)/(R) Fortnite Fleet Force Bundle - Nintendo Switch
